overview:
With offices in Stockholm and Paris, Opera Capital Partners is a corporate finance boutique providing mergers & acquisitions, private placement and other financial advisory services to growth companies.

Created in 2009, OCP offers a blend of expertise, both from the financial sector and from the industry. We pride ourselves to be true entrepreneurs , willing to share our experience and skills to build and grow companies.

OCP has a strong focus on the technology industries, with a core expertise in ICT (Internet, Communication, Telecom) and the Cleantech sector.

Recent transactions in Sweden, Denmark, Finland and France were completed in segments such as online video advertising, video-on-demand, eCommerce, digital media, telecom software solution, telecom services, aeronautics, solar photovoltaic.

Our services include:

  • Mergers & Acquisitions(Buy-side / Sell-side advisory, advisory on exit strategy - Spin-offs, Carve out, Leverage Buy-Out, … -, acquisition negotiation, strategic Alliances
  • Private Placement (Financing growth, M&Aor shareholders exit - cash out, secondary deals, …)
  • Corporate and Institutional Investors Services (CIIS): CIIS is a tailored service for Corporate and Institutional Investors willing to keep a strategic watch on the French and Scandinavian markets, through a partner with strong business network and knowledge of these markets: deal sourcing, due diligence, valuation and fairness opinions, production of industry specific research documents, external environment analysis, tracking of M&A and VC transactions, …
